Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Programma di studio postlaurea presso la Hebrew University of Jerusalem (borsa del Ministero degli Esteri) Year abroad with a scholarship from the Israeli Government and the Rothberg International School: Hebrew University of Jerusalem (one year program) language skills: Hebrew and Arabic

Dottorato di ricerca presso l´Università di Cambridge Ph.D., Churchill College, Cambridge and Faculty of Divinity, University of Cambridge: research on the “Chronicle of the Ottoman Empire” written in the 16th century by Elia Capsali of Candia (Crete). Supervisor: Prof. N. De Lange

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: ‘Cultural relations between Cretan Jewish Intellectuals and Christian Italian intellectuals: Elia Capsali’s library’, British Association for Jewish Studies, University of Southampton
‘New unpublished documents from the State Venetian Archives on the Capsalis and the Jewish Community of Candia’, Congress organised by European Association for Jewish Studies, Moscow, Russia
‘Messianism and Rhetoric in Elia Capsali’s Seder Eliyahu Zuta’ 20th International Congress organised by the University of Bologna, Ravenna, Italy

ʽThe case of Crete: language and ethnicity in 16th century Creteʼ Tenth Mediterranean Meeting organised by the European University Institute, Montecatini ʽThe case of Crete: language and ethnicity in 16th century Creteʼ

ʽNegotiating power: Cretan Jewish Women and Muslim Women from Aintab before the Authoritiesʼ Minorities in Colonial Settings: The Jews in Venice’s Hellenic Territories (1400-1800); University of Tel Aviv
ʽHebrew translations and transcriptions of the Qur’ānʼ Early Translations of the Qur’ān, Part II, University of Bochum
Religious cohabitation in European towns (10th-15th centuries) Fondation Treilles France ʽReligious identity and space in Venetian Candiaʼ
Minorités et Cohabitations Religieuses du Moyen-Âge à nos Jours ʽJewish women of the Trent trialʼ

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Ricercatrice presso l´Universitá di Trento sui documenti riguardanti il processo agli ebrei per la morte di "San Simonino"

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Premio nazionale "Primo Levi" per la miglior tesi su una materia ebraica
Award for college and university fees from AHRB
Award from the Cecil Roth Foundation
Alessandro Nangeroni National Prize (best thesis on monotheisms) Università di Milano Bicocca
Humanities research award from the Board of Graduate Studies, University of Cambridge
Inaugural Endeavour Australia Post-Doctoral Research Fellowship, awarded by the Australian Federal Government, one of three awarded in all fields to EU applicants

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Ricercatrice per il progetto “Mapping the Jewish communities of the Byzantine Empire”
Relmin Project on legal sources (on minorities in Europe) Postdoctoral position at RELMIN Maison des Sciences de l'Homme Ange-Guépin 5 Allée Jacques Berque, - BP12105, Nantes

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Supervisor di lingua e letteratura greca e latina presso il Trinity Hall College e il Churchill College di Cambridge

Docente presso l´Università di Halle, Facoltá di Orientalistica Lecturer for the Winter Semester at the University of Halle-Wittenberg. Title of the course: “Islam and the Jews during the Renaissance time.”
Docente di lingua italiana presso l´Universitá di Karlsruhe (Germania)
